pr_title: [NETBEANS-4930] Upgrade Gradle Tooling 6.7 with JDK-15 Support

timeline.message: [NETBEANS-4930] Upgrade Gradle Tooling 6.7 with JDK-15 Support
[NETBEANS-4930] Upgrade Gradle Tooling 6.7 with JDK-15 Support

timeline.bodyText: This change is fine, it is very likely compatible.
timeline.author: JaroslavTulach

-2564503471E1FC18A4E7D2A120BC567EA3B26AA4 gradle-4.10.2-bin.zip

replies.bodyText:
Well this one is just to compile the netbeans-gradle-tooling. It is needed to be able to debug the tooling jar inside NetBeans when using a modern JDK. The tooling jar still on Java 8 source (and with that target) level.
Basically this is just a compile-only dependency.
replies.author: lkishalmi
